channel.title: General Discussion Section = Bad Idea
channel.description:
At first, the General Discussion section seemed like heaven. I thought it'd be a chance to share things we couldn't share in other sections. However, it seems like there's more and more idiots daily posting useless shit on here that's not needed, and apparently a ton of flame wars (Just look at some of the locked topics or game topics.)
I think the rules need to be more specific and strongly enforced. Apparently, people aren't getting the message that games and other similar topics aren't discussion ("Take a pic of your inventory!").
Discuss?

item.title: General Discussion Section = Bad Idea
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:37, topic:280442”][quote author=Newty link=topic=370436.msg2803017#msg2803017 date=1243550687]
TBH, the desicion is not ours, it is a desicion that was made by the staff, and we will have to live with it.
[/quote]
or leave.[/quote]
or just man up and accept it, if moderators are needed they will get appointed if people deserver moderator they will get it .Simple as.

Read full topic

item.title: General Discussion Section = Bad Idea
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

I don’t think this section is a bad idea at all, it’s just if people are abusing it for post count or troll-lulz modifications need to be made. You could make posts not count towards people’s post count or as people have suggested, just get more moderators.

Read full topic

item.title: General Discussion Section = Bad Idea
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:34, topic:280442”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=370436.msg2802756#msg2802756 date=1243542399]

I haven’t seen Archer over here once.

I’ve actually seen Archer around moderating, mostly at the models section, though.
He is fairly active, and does do his job.

He’s only been a moderator for a week…
[/quote]

I know but I’m on this forum everyday for some time and I haven’t seen any posts or locked topics that he has locked.[/quote]

It was my response to Si Force saying that he’s active.

Read full topic

item.title: General Discussion Section = Bad Idea
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:30, topic:280442”][quote author=cocoa link=topic=370436.msg2801520#msg2801520 date=1243464508]

@needing more mods: We have enough since Archer and Chassy joined, the other’s will start being active again after summer starts.

Archer is only active at MITB.

Exactly, it’s not like he moderates over here. They need someone who is active over here to moderate this side of Mopar.
I.E.: Lin, sanga282, Newty
[/quote]

Sometimes you guys are just too fucking ignorant. He was made a mod so that he DID become more active over here, which he is. Don’t talk about shit you have absolutely no idea on.[/quote]

Maybe you guys should start choosing people who are actually active over here instead of people who are active on that side of the forums, so they wouldn’t have to become more active over here?

Read full topic

item.title: General Discussion Section = Bad Idea
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:21, topic:280442”][quote author=Newty link=topic=370436.msg2801790#msg2801790 date=1243476881]

@needing more mods: We have enough since Archer and Chassy joined, the other’s will start being active again after summer starts.

Archer is only active at MITB.

Exactly, it’s not like he moderates over here. They need someone who is active over here to moderate this side of Mopar.
I.E.: Lin, sanga282, Newty

I.E.: PrimaDude, Si Force.

Got a problem with me lol…?
[/quote]

You shouldn’t make an assumption that someone doesn’t like you if they don’t think you’d be the best choice for moderator; if everyone were to pick you for moderator just because they like you, then that would be considered favoritism, though most of the moderators are picked out of it anyways.[/quote]

The reason I assumed that is because he never gave a reason to exclude me from the list, he just left my name out.

However, it really doesn’t matter, because that list of people has no more of a chance then anyone else on these forums to get moderator.

Read full topic
